name: Execution Arena (Pit)
LocationDStext: May not deploy to Bespin, Dagobah, Endor or Hoth.  May deploy Dark Waters here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  [Virtual Block 4] Krayt Dragon Bones and your Force drains here are canceled.
LocationLStext: If a ferocious creature here, characters and creatures cannot move from here, and, once during opponent's control phase, if opponent controls an adjacent site, lose 1 Force.  (Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)
